info.name: usage
info.value: Test 1: press all joystick inputs. Test 4: type NAGEL137. Hold UP to advance.

info.value: Press 0 then 1 for Blockout/Dam Buster, press 0 then 2 for Breakdown

info.value: Press 1 for Race/Speedway, press 2 for 3-lap Spin-out, press 4 for 15-lap Spin-out, press 5 for Cryptogram/Crypto-logic

info.value: Press 1 for Course de Voitures, press 2 for 3-lap Autodrome, press 4 for 15-lap Autodrome, press 5 for Cryptogramme
